name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Support Engineer with over 10 years of experience in SaaS solutions and backend system design. Proficient in developing and maintaining high-quality APIs, leveraging a diverse tech stack that includes **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **C#**, **PHP**, **JavaScript**, **SQL**, and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. Skilled in tools such as **Salesforce**, **PowerShell**, **SharePoint**, and monitoring applications including **Dynatrace**. Highly experienced in troubleshooting and automating support processes, utilizing advanced protocols like **SAML** and **oAuth**. Demonstrated ability to contribute to high-impact projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer scalable **API** backend services that enhance **SaaS** document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Implemented event-driven architectures using **Celery** and **Redis** for streamlined asynchronous processing of over **1,000** financial transaction requests per minute.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** to manage infrastructure as code, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment time.
Designed and maintained robust data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for regulatory data exchange, ensuring compliance and accuracy in data flow with a **99.9%** success rate.
Executed comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable, and reliable authentication systems, enhancing user security across platforms.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot system integration challenges and implement compliance strategies, overseeing release processes to ensure scheduled deployments are met on time.

• Developed robust **APIs** in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes, improving efficiency by **30%**.
• Engineered and managed event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, which reduced processing time by **25%**.
• Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services**, using **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments with a **99.9%** uptime.
• Designed and implemented data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, which automated data flow and enhanced security compliance.
• Conducted thorough security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls, enhancing security measures by **40%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, contributing to successful releases and minimizing deployment errors.

• Developed and maintained **API** integrations to enhance responsiveness and scalability of SaaS solutions using **Python** and **Flask**.
• Utilized **SQL** databases, specifically **PostgreSQL**, for robust data management and to ensure high performance and efficiency in trade execution systems.

• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build user-friendly services and interfaces, improving user satisfaction ratings by **25%** through effective **REST API** communication.
• Ensured compliance with crucial regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, minimizing risk exposure and enhancing overall system security.
• Implemented automated testing frameworks using **PyTest**, ensuring that over **90%** of the platform features passed rigorous QA checks, thus reducing downtime.
• Streamlined backend processing with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, which improved task execution efficiency by **40%**, minimizing response delays for end-users.
